titles: Devotion and reason first essay : wherein modern devotion for the dead is brought to solid principles, and made rational : in way of answer to Mr J.M.'s Remembrance for the living to pray for the dead / by Thomas White, Gent.
author: White, Thomas, 1593-1676.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Mumford, J. --  (James), 1606-1666. --  Remembrance for the living to pray for the dead.
